column1: Little Goat Diner////If you're with a group
column2: be ready for a wait. I was alone both times and I wasn't too thrilled with one of the hostesses the 1st time around. I walked in and said I was alone
column4: give me a minute and we can fit you at the counter... So I stood and waited for about 15 minutes. At the point I asked the other hostesss how long the wait was going to be and she handed me some menus and sent me over to the counter right away. SO yeah
column5: I dunno what was going on there
column6: but it was kind of annoying.
